00018 /*! k can be negative */
00019 FMB_INLINE long pow_of_minus_1(long k){
00020   /* Other methods: 
00021      - bit mask on the weak bit (portability problem : Big Endian, Little Endian)
00022      - static array containing all the values of (-1)^m for m from 0 to ...
00023   */
00024   return ((k%2) ? -1 : 1);
00025 }

00027 #define FMB_NEGATE_POW_OF_MINUS_1(v) (v = -v /* v *= -1.0 */)

00031 FACT_T fact(long k);

00036 /*! binomial_coef(k,n) = n! / k!(n-k)! = (n (n-1) (n-2) ... (n-k+1))/(k!) */
00037 /* unsigned long binomial_coef(unsigned long k,unsigned long n); */
00038 BINOMIAL_COEF_T binomial_coef(long k, long n);

00077 /*********************************************************************************************
00078 
00079    COMPLEX DEFINED AS X+iY
00080 
00081 *********************************************************************************************/
00082 
00083 
00084 typedef struct {
00085   REAL_T dat[2];
00086 } complex_t;
00087 
00088 #define REAL 0
00089 #define IMAG 1
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 /******************************* Basic functions: *******************************************/
00095 FMB_INLINE void complex_Affect(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_target, 
00096                                FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_src){ 
00097   p_target->dat[REAL] = p_src->dat[REAL]; 
00098   p_target->dat[IMAG] = p_src->dat[IMAG]; 
00099 }
00100 FMB_INLINE void complex_Convert_real2complex(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_res,
00101                                              REAL_T real){ 
00102   p_res->dat[REAL] = real; p_res->dat[IMAG] = (REAL_T)0; 
00103 }
00104 FMB_INLINE void complex_Set_real(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, REAL_T v){
00105   p->dat[REAL] = v; 
00106 }
00107 FMB_INLINE REAL_T complex_Get_real(FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00108   return p->dat[REAL];
00109 }
00110 FMB_INLINE void complex_Set_imaginary(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, REAL_T v){
00111   p->dat[IMAG] = v; 
00112 }
00113 FMB_INLINE REAL_T complex_Get_imaginary(FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00114   return p->dat[IMAG];
00115 }
00116 FMB_INLINE void complex_Convert_position2complex(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_complex, 
00117                                                  FMB_CONST position_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_pos){
00118   complex_Set_real(p_complex, position_Get_x(p_pos));
00119   complex_Set_imaginary(p_complex, position_Get_y(p_pos));
00120 }

00125 /******************************* Arithmetic and mathematical functions: *********************/
00126 /*! *p1 = *p1 + *p2 */
00127 /* Because of the FMB_RESTRICT, we can not have: p1==p2. */ 
00128 FMB_INLINE void complex_Plus(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00129                              FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){ 
00130 #ifdef _DEBUG_
00131   if (p1 == p2){
00132     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_Plus(p1, p2), p1 == p2.\n");
00133   }
00134 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */
00135   p1->dat[REAL] += p2->dat[REAL]; p1->dat[IMAG] += p2->dat[IMAG]; 
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*! *p1 = *p1 - *p2 : */
00139 /* Because of the FMB_RESTRICT, we can not have: p1==p2. */ 
00140 FMB_INLINE void complex_Minus(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00141                               FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){
00142 #ifdef _DEBUG_
00143   if (p1 == p2){
00144     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_Minus(p1, p2), p1 == p2.\n");
00145   }
00146 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */
00147   p1->dat[REAL] -= p2->dat[REAL]; p1->dat[IMAG] -= p2->dat[IMAG]; 
00148 }
00149 
00150 /*! *p = (*p) * real */
00151 FMB_INLINE void complex_Mult_by_real(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, REAL_T real){ 
00152   p->dat[REAL] *= real; p->dat[IMAG] *= real;
00153 }
00154 
00155 /*! *p1 = (*p1) * (*p2) \n
00156    We must have p1 != p2. */
00157 FMB_INLINE void complex_Mult(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00158                              FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){ 
00159   REAL_T aux = p1->dat[REAL]; 
00160 #ifdef _DEBUG_
00161   if (p1 == p2){ 
00162     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_Mult(p1, p2), p1 == p2!\n"); 
00163   } 
00164 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */
00165   p1->dat[REAL] = (aux * p2->dat[REAL]) - (p1->dat[IMAG] * p2->dat[IMAG]); 
00166   p1->dat[IMAG] = (aux * p2->dat[IMAG]) + (p1->dat[IMAG] * p2->dat[REAL]); 
00167 }
00168 
00169 /*! *p1 = (*p1) * (*p2) \n
00170    We can have p1 == p2. */
00171 FMB_INLINE void complex_Mult_safe(complex_t *p1, FMB_CONST complex_t *p2){
00172   REAL_T aux1 = p1->dat[REAL] ; 
00173   REAL_T aux2 = p2->dat[REAL] ; 
00174   p1->dat[REAL] = (aux1 * aux2) - (p1->dat[IMAG] * p2->dat[IMAG]); 
00175   p1->dat[IMAG] = (aux1 * p2->dat[IMAG]) + (p1->dat[IMAG] * aux2); 
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 /*! *p1= (*p2) * (*p3) \n
00180   We must have: pi!=pj, for all i and j. */
00181 FMB_INLINE void complex_Mult_with_res(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00182                                       FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2, 
00183                                       FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p3){ 
00184 #ifdef _DEBUG_ 
00185   if (p1 == p2 || p1 == p3 || p2==p3){ 
00186     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_Mult_with_res(p1, p2, p3), pi==pj!\n"); 
00187   } 
00188 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */ 
00189   p1->dat[REAL] = (p2->dat[REAL] * p3->dat[REAL]) - (p2->dat[IMAG] * p3->dat[IMAG]); 
00190   p1->dat[IMAG] = (p2->dat[REAL] * p3->dat[IMAG]) + (p2->dat[IMAG] * p3->dat[REAL]); 
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 /*! *p1 = *p1 / *p2 \n
00195    We must have p1 != p2 */
00196 FMB_INLINE void complex_Div(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00197                             FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){
00198   REAL_T r2 = (p2->dat[REAL] * p2->dat[REAL]) + (p2->dat[IMAG] * p2->dat[IMAG]); 
00199   REAL_T aux = p1->dat[REAL]; 
00200 #ifdef _DEBUG_ 
00201   if (p1 == p2){ 
00202     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_Div(p1, p2), p1==p2.\n"); 
00203   } 
00204 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */ 
00205   p1->dat[REAL] = ((aux * p2->dat[REAL]) + (p1->dat[IMAG] * p2->dat[IMAG])) / r2; 
00206   p1->dat[IMAG] = ((p1->dat[IMAG] * p2->dat[REAL]) - (aux * p2->dat[IMAG])) / r2; 
00207 }
00208 
00209 /*! *p = 1 / *p : */
00210 FMB_INLINE void complex_Inverse(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00211   REAL_T r = (p->dat[REAL] * p->dat[REAL]) + (p->dat[IMAG] * p->dat[IMAG]); 
00212   p->dat[REAL] = p->dat[REAL] / r; 
00213   p->dat[IMAG] = p->dat[IMAG] / ((REAL_T)0 - r);
00214 }
00215 
00216 /*! With c = r.exp(i.t) (where i^2 = -1), we have: \n
00217    log(c) = log(r) + i.t, where log(r) is the log with base e of r. \n
00218    So with cartesian coordinates : \n
00219    log((x,y) = log(sqrt(x^2 + y^2)) + i.arctan(y/x) \n
00220    \n
00221    *p = log(*p) */
00222 FMB_INLINE void complex_Log(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){ 
00223   REAL_T r = FMB_SQRT((p->dat[REAL] * p->dat[REAL]) + (p->dat[IMAG] * p->dat[IMAG])); 
00224   p->dat[IMAG] = angle_Compute_from_cartesian(p->dat[REAL], p->dat[IMAG]);
00225 /*   p->dat[IMAG] = ((p->dat[REAL] == 0.0) ?  */
00226 /*                  1.0 :  */
00227 /*                  ((p->dat[IMAG] < 0.0) ?  */
00228 /*                   atan(p->dat[IMAG] / p->dat[REAL]) + M_PI_2 :  */
00229 /*                   atan(p->dat[IMAG] / p->dat[REAL])));  */
00230   p->dat[REAL] = FMB_LOG(r); 
00231 } 
00232 
00233 /*! *p = (*p)^k   \n
00234   We use a function for recursivity. \n
00235   k is a positive (or null) integer. */
00236 void complex_Pow(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, unsigned long k);

00240 /******************************* Conjugate: *************************************************/
00241 FMB_INLINE void complex_Conjugate(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00242   complex_Set_imaginary(p, - complex_Get_imaginary(p));
00243 } 
00244 FMB_INLINE void complex_Conjugate_with_res(FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p,
00245                                            complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_res){
00246   complex_Set_real(p_res, complex_Get_real(p));
00247   complex_Set_imaginary(p_res, - complex_Get_imaginary(p));
00248 }
00249 /*! *p1 = (*p1) * \overline{(*p2)}, where \overline{z} is the conjugate of the complex z \n
00250    We must have p1 != p2. */
00251 FMB_INLINE void complex_Mult_by_conjugate(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00252                                           FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){
00253   REAL_T aux = complex_Get_real(p1); 
00254 #ifdef _DEBUG_
00255   if (p1 == p2){ 
00256     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_Mult_by_conjugate(p1, p2), p1 == p2!\n"); 
00257   } 
00258 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */
00259   complex_Set_real(p1, 
00260                    (aux * complex_Get_real(p2)) + 
00261                    (complex_Get_imaginary(p1) * complex_Get_imaginary(p2))); 
00262   complex_Set_imaginary(p1, 
00263                         (complex_Get_imaginary(p1) * complex_Get_real(p2)) - 
00264                         (aux * complex_Get_imaginary(p2))); 
00265 }

00270 /******************************* Argument & magnitude: **************************************/
00271 /* #define EXPANSION_TERM_GET_ARGUMENT(p) complex_Get_argument(p) */
00272 FMB_INLINE void complex_Set_magnitude_and_argument(complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, REAL_T m, REAL_T a){
00273   /* Nothing to be checked for the values of m and a. */
00274   REAL_T sin_a = FMB_SIN(a);
00275   REAL_T cos_a = FMB_SIN(a + M_PI_2); /* VECTORIZATION ???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????????*/
00276   complex_Set_real(p, m * cos_a);
00277   complex_Set_imaginary(p, m * sin_a);
00278 }

00283 /******************************* Miscellaneous: *********************************************/
00284 FMB_INLINE void complex_Display(FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, FILE *f){
00285   fprintf(f, "(");
00286   fprintf(f, HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, complex_Get_real(p));
00287   fprintf(f, ", ");
00288   fprintf(f, HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, complex_Get_imaginary(p));
00289   fprintf(f, ")");
00290 }

00313 /*! r in ]-\infty, +\infty[                                                             \n
00314     theta in ]-\infty, +\infty[                                                         \n
00315     If we want to compare (i.e., do they equal ?) two complex_exp_t variables we have   \n
00316     first to convert them as complex_t.                                                 */
00317 
00318 typedef struct{
00319   REAL_T dat[2];
00320 } complex_exp_t;
00321 
00322 #define MAG 0
00323 #define ARG 1
00324 
00325 
00326 /******************************* Get and Set argument: **************************************/
00327 FMB_INLINE REAL_T complex_exp_Get_argument(FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00328   return p->dat[ARG];
00329 }
00330 
00331 /*! The user has nothing to ensure on the value of v. */
00332 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Set_argument(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, REAL_T v){
00333   p->dat[ARG] = v;
00334 }
00335

00338 /******************************* Get and Set magnitude: *************************************/
00339 FMB_INLINE REAL_T complex_exp_Get_magnitude(FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00340   return p->dat[MAG];
00341 }
00342 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Set_magnitude(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, REAL_T v){
00343     p->dat[MAG] = v;
00344 }
00345

00347 
00348 
00349 /******************************* Get and Set both: ******************************************/
00350 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p,
00351                                                        REAL_T mag_value,
00352                                                        REAL_T arg_value){
00353   complex_exp_Set_argument(p, arg_value);
00354   complex_exp_Set_magnitude(p, mag_value);
00355 }

00360 /*********************** Real & Imaginary parts, Conjugate: *********************************/
00361 FMB_INLINE REAL_T complex_exp_Get_real(FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00362   return complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p) * FMB_COS(complex_exp_Get_argument(p));
00363 }
00364 FMB_INLINE REAL_T complex_exp_Get_imaginary(FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00365   return complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p) * FMB_SIN(complex_exp_Get_argument(p));
00366 }
00367 
00368 /*! *p_result = \overline{*p} 
00369   We cannot have: p==p_result (because of FMB_RESTRICT). */
00370 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Conjugate_with_res(FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p,
00371                                                complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_result){
00372 #ifdef _DEBUG_ 
00373   if (p == p_result){ 
00374     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_exp_Conjugate_with_res(p, p_result), p==p_result.\n"); 
00375   } 
00376 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */   
00377   complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(p_result,
00378                                          complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p),
00379                                          - complex_exp_Get_argument(p));
00380 }
00381 /*! *p = \overline{*p} */
00382 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Conjugate(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00383   complex_exp_Set_argument(p, - complex_exp_Get_argument(p));
00384 }

00388 /***************************** complex_exp_t <-> complex_t: *********************************/
00389 FMB_INLINE void complex_2complex_exp(FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, 
00390                                      complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_exp){
00391   complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(p_exp,  
00392                                          FMB_SQRT((complex_Get_real(p) * complex_Get_real(p)) + (complex_Get_imaginary(p) * complex_Get_imaginary(p))),
00393                                          angle_Compute_from_cartesian(complex_Get_real(p), complex_Get_imaginary(p)));
00394 }
00395 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_2complex(FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_exp, 
00396                                      complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT p){
00397   complex_Set_real(p, complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p_exp) * FMB_COS(complex_exp_Get_argument(p_exp)));
00398   complex_Set_imaginary(p, complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p_exp) * FMB_SIN(complex_exp_Get_argument(p_exp)));
00399 }

00402 /*********************************** Arithmetic: ********************************************/
00403 /*! *p1 = *p1 + *p2 */
00404 /* surement moyen de faire (un peu) mieux ... */
00405 /* Because of the FMB_RESTRICT, we can not have: p1==p2. */ 
00406 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Plus(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1,
00407                                  FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){
00408   complex_t c1, c2;
00409 #ifdef _DEBUG_ 
00410   if (p1 == p2){ 
00411     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_exp_Plus(p1, p2), p1==p2.\n"); 
00412   } 
00413 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */   
00414   complex_exp_2complex(p1, &c1);
00415   complex_exp_2complex(p2, &c2);
00416   complex_Plus(&c1, &c2);
00417   complex_2complex_exp(&c1, p1);
00418 }
00419 
00420 /*! *p = (*p) * real */
00421 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Mult_by_real(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, 
00422                                          REAL_T real){
00423   complex_exp_Set_magnitude(p, real * complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p));
00424 }
00425 
00426 /*! *p1 = (*p1) * (*p2) \n
00427   We can not have p1 == p2 (because of FMB_RESTRICT). */
00428 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Mult(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00429                                  FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){
00430 #ifdef _DEBUG_ 
00431   if (p1 == p2){ 
00432     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_exp_Mult(p1, p2), p1==p2.\n"); 
00433   } 
00434 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */ 
00435   complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(p1, 
00436                                          complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p1) * complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p2),
00437                                          complex_exp_Get_argument(p1) + complex_exp_Get_argument(p2));
00438 }
00439 
00440 /*! *p1= (*p2) * (*p3) \n
00441   We must have pi != pj, for all i and j. */
00442 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Mult_with_res(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00443                                           FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2, 
00444                                           FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p3){ 
00445 #ifdef _DEBUG_ 
00446   if (p1 == p2 || p1 == p3 || p2==p3){ 
00447     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_exp_Mult_with_res(p1, p2, p3), pi==pj!\n"); 
00448   } 
00449 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */ 
00450   complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(p1, 
00451                                          complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p2) * complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p3),
00452                                          complex_exp_Get_argument(p2) + complex_exp_Get_argument(p3));
00453 }
00454 
00455 /*! *p1 = (*p1) * \overline{(*p2)} \n
00456   We can not have p1 == p2 (because of FMB_RESTRICT). */
00457 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Mult_by_conjugate(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p1, 
00458                                               FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p2){
00459 #ifdef _DEBUG_ 
00460   if (p1 == p2){ 
00461     FMB_error("ERROR: in complex_exp_Mult_by_conjugate(p1, p2), p1==p2!\n"); 
00462   } 
00463 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */ 
00464   complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(p1, 
00465                                          complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p1) * complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p2),
00466                                          complex_exp_Get_argument(p1) - complex_exp_Get_argument(p2));
00467 }

00473 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Affect(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_target, 
00474                                    FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_src){ 
00475   complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(p_target, 
00476                                          complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p_src),
00477                                          complex_exp_Get_argument(p_src));
00478 }

00480 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Convert_real2complex(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_res, 
00481                                                  REAL_T real){ 
00482   complex_exp_Set_magnitude_and_argument(p_res, real, (REAL_T) 0.0);
00483 }

00485 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Display(FMB_CONST complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p, FILE *f){
00486   fprintf(f, "(r=");
00487   fprintf(f, HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, complex_exp_Get_magnitude(p));
00488   fprintf(f, ", arg=");
00489   fprintf(f, HIGH_PRECISION_DOUBLE_FPRINTF, complex_exp_Get_argument(p));
00490   fprintf(f, ")");
00491 }
00492 
00493 /*! *p_result = i^k                       \n
00494   k is an integer (positive or negative). */
00495 FMB_INLINE void complex_exp_Pow_of_i(complex_exp_t *FMB_RESTRICT p_result, 
00496                                      unsigned long k){
00497   complex_exp_Set_magnitude(p_result, (REAL_T) 1);
00498   if (! k%4)
00499     complex_exp_Set_argument(p_result, (REAL_T) 0);
00500   else 
00501     if (! k%2)
00502       complex_exp_Set_argument(p_result, (((k / 2) % 2) ? (REAL_T) M_PI : (REAL_T) 0 )); 
00503     else
00504       complex_exp_Set_argument(p_result, M_PI_2 *k); 
00505 }
